summary: Po is to host the annual winter holiday feast and he struggles to meet his friends' expectations.
cast: Jack Black|Dustin Hoffman|Angelina Jolie|Seth Rogen|Lucy Liu|David Cross|James Hong|Jack McBrayer|Dan Fogler|Jackie Chan|Jonathan Groff|Conrad Vernon|Tom Owens|Susan Fitzer|Mick Wingert|Stephen Kearin|Lena Golia|Ilana Klusky
title: La fiesta de Kung Fu Panda
